tag_list: graphic-designer, designer, illustrator, ui-designer, interaction-designer, icon-designer
overview:
Graphic Designer!

Designed his first website when he was 13. When he was 15, he was approached by an Australian client to design a logo for their business. At that time the client did not know that he was 15. He did the work and was paid 400$ for that. When the client asked for payment information he gave them his father’s bank account number because he didn’t have a bank account at that time. Imagine their surprise :) Almost 8 years have passed since he designed his first logo and during this time he has done a lot of design for the web, print, earned a Civil Engineering degree and even started a one man design studio - Logoraman.
